meanings.definition: At some time; at an unspecified time in the past or future.
meanings.sent1: I will meet you somewhen tomorrow for lunch.
meanings.sent2: Let's plan to go to the beach somewhen next week.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if we'll ever find that lost sock somewhen in the future.
meanings.sent4: The memories of our childhood play hide-and-seek somewhen in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The idea of traveling to space seems like a dream somewhen in the distant future.

meanings.sent2: The package is expected to arrive somewhen this afternoon.
meanings.sent3: I hope to finish reading the book somewhen before the weekend.
meanings.sent4: The sun sets somewhen every evening, painting the sky in beautiful colors.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of accomplishment will come somewhen after you complete the task.
